about_the_game:
Overview:Cybernetic Apocalypse: Rogue Shooter is an action-packed roguelike shooter set in a dystopian cyberpunk future overrun by hordes of zombies, giants, and even dragons. As a lone survivor equipped with high-tech weaponry and cybernetic enhancements, you must navigate through levels filled with relentless enemies, deadly traps, and scarce resources. Each playthrough offers a unique experience, challenging you to adapt and survive in a hostile world where death lurks around every corner.

Intense Roguelike Shooter Action: Experience adrenaline-pumping, fast-paced gameplay as you fight your way through generated levels filled with relentless enemies and challenging obstacles.
Diverse Enemies: Encounter a variety of enemies, including hordes of undead zombies, towering giants, and fearsome dragons. Each enemy type presents unique challenges and requires different strategies to defeat.
Sci-Fi Cyberpunk Setting: Immerse yourself in a gritty cyberpunk world filled with neon lights, futuristic technology as you uncover the secrets of the zombie outbreak.
Upgradeable Weapons and Abilities: Customize your playstyle with a wide range of weapons, upgrade your arsenal and unlock devastating abilities to turn the tide of battle in your favor.
